metadata.description: Global Tropical cyclone (TC) best track data already exist as individual storm tracks at other agencies. The intent of the IBTrACS project is to overcome data availability issues. This was achieved by working directly with all the Regional Specialized Meteorological Centers and other international centers and individuals to create a global best track dataset, merging storm information from multiple centers into one product and archiving the data for public use. The World Meteorological Organization  Tropical Cyclone Programme has endorsed IBTrACS as an official archiving and distribution resource for tropical cyclone best track data. The IBTrACS project: contains the most complete global set of historical tropical cyclones available, combines information from numerous tropical cyclone datasets, simplifies inter-agency comparisons by providing storm data from multiple sources in one place, provides data in popular formats to facilitate analysis and checks the quality of storm inventories, positions, pressures, and wind speeds, passing the information on to the user. The primary intent of IBTrACS is to support scientific research efforts.
metadata.descriptionCn: 热带气旋（TC）最佳路径数据已经作为单独的风暴路径存在于其他机构。 IBTrACS将这些数据集合并到一个全球TC数据库中。目的是克服数据可用性问题，通过直接与所有区域专门气象中心和其他国际中心和个人合作，创建全球最佳轨道数据集，将多个中心的风暴信息合并成一个产品，并将数据存档供公众使用。 世界气象组织热带气旋方案已批准IBTrACS作为热带气旋最佳路径数据的官方归档和分发资源。 IBTrACS 包含最完整的全球历史热带气旋集，结合来自许多热带气旋数据集的信息 ， 通过在一个地方提供来自多个源的风暴数据，简化机构间比较， 提供流行格式的数据以方便分析， 检查风暴库存、位置、压力和风速的质量，将信息传递给用户。在集中位置提供热带气旋最佳路径数据，以帮助我们了解全球热带气旋的分布、频率和强度。IBTrACS的主要目的是支持科学研究工作。

background: Given the significant impact of tropical cyclones (TCs) on human life, property, and ecology, it is understandable that much research has gone into understanding their distribution, frequency, and intensity around the world and how climate change might affect these parameters. Many storm characteristics help to define how an individual storm impacts life and property, such as maximum sustained wind (MSW), the distance at which various wind speeds extend outward from the storm center, rainfall patterns, minimum sea level pressure (MSLP), and storm translation speed. Despite the many facets of a storm, much of the tropical cyclone data worldwide consists of the best estimates of storm position and intensity at 6-hourly intervals only, which are termed best-track data. Optimally, best-track data are the result of postseason reanalysis of a storm’s position and intensity from all available data—for example, ship, surface, and satellite observations. However, with advances in observing system technologies, operational procedures, and scientific knowledge, the historical record of best tracks is inhomogeneous by construction. In recent decades, best-track data were used to assess the interannual and interdecadal variability of tropical cyclones and their relation to global climate change. In conjunction with other datasets, global best-track data are crucial for understanding the characteristics and impacts of tropical cyclones. Therefore, NOAA’s National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), in concert with the World Data Center for Meteorology—Asheville, has developed a comprehensive dataset through the collection of global tropical cyclone best-track data.
research objective: The goal was to inventory reported tropical cyclones worldwide and their characteristics and to provide the data as one global dataset: the International Best Track Archive for Climate Stewardship (Knapp et al. 2009). IBTrACS provides a collation of currently available best-track data from agencies worldwide.
methods: Best-track data from each of the agencies listed above were obtained either directly from agency Web sites or via personal communication. Upon receipt of the electronic best-track data files, data were converted into a common format. The first step in combining best-track data is to identify each storm uniquely—that is, which storms reported from one agency were also reported by another. The next step was to combine intensity estimates.
dataset: The IBTrACS dataset contains 27 storm attributes in seven different basins: the North Atlantic (NA), eastern Pacific (EP), western North Pacific (WP), northern Indian Ocean (NI), southern Indian Ocean (SI), South Pacific (SP), and South Atlantic (SA). Furthermore, IBTrACS is provided in several formats: netCDF, Automated Tropical Cyclone Forecast (ATCF), HURDAT, cyclone extended markup language (cXML), the WMO revised standard format, and comma-separated values (CSV).
backgroundCn: 考虑到热带气旋（TC）对人类生活、财产和生态的重大影响，理解它们在全球的分布、频率和强度以及气候变化可能如何影响这些参数的研究显得尤为重要。许多风暴特征有助于定义单个风暴对生活和财产的影响，例如最大持续风速（MSW）、不同风速向外扩展的距离、降雨模式、最低海平面气压（MSLP）和风暴平移速度。尽管风暴有许多方面，但全球的热带气旋数据大多由每6小时一次的最佳轨迹数据组成，这些数据是对风暴位置和强度的最佳估计。理想情况下，最佳轨迹数据是通过对风暴位置和强度的后期分析，结合所有可用数据（例如船只、地面和卫星观测）得出的。然而，随着观测系统技术、操作程序和科学知识的进步，历史最佳轨迹记录在构建上是不均匀的。在最近几十年中，最佳轨迹数据被用来评估热带气旋的年际和年代际变率及其与全球气候变化的关系。结合其他数据集，全球最佳轨迹数据对于理解热带气旋的特征和影响至关重要。因此，美国国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）的国家气候数据中心（NCDC）与气象世界数据中心—阿什维尔合作，开发了一个综合数据集，通过收集全球热带气旋最佳轨迹数据。
research objectiveCn: 目标是对全球报告的热带气旋及其特征进行清查，并将数据提供为一个全球数据集：国际气候管理最佳轨迹档案（Knapp et al. 2009）。IBTrACS提供了来自全球各机构的当前可用最佳轨迹数据的汇总。
methodsCn: 来自上述各机构的最佳轨迹数据要么直接从机构网站获取，要么通过个人沟通获得。在收到电子最佳轨迹数据文件后，数据被转换为统一格式。合并最佳轨迹数据的第一步是唯一识别每个风暴——即识别一个机构报告的风暴是否也被另一个机构报告。下一步是合并强度估计。
datasetCn: IBTrACS 数据集包含 27 个风暴属性，分布在七个不同的海域：北大西洋 (NA)、东太平洋 (EP)、西北太平洋 (WP)、北印度洋 (NI)、南印度洋 (SI)、南太平洋 (SP) 和南大西洋 (SA)。此外，IBTrACS 以多种格式提供：netCDF、自动热带气旋预报 (ATCF)、HURDAT、气旋扩展标记语言 (cXML)、WMO 修订标准格式和逗号分隔值 (CSV)。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how best-track data from multiple agencies are standardized and combined for global analysis?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例，说明如何将来自多个机构的最佳轨迹数据标准化并结合起来进行全球分析？
Example.AnswerEn: Best-track data from various agencies are obtained either directly from agency websites or through personal communication. Upon receipt, the data files are converted into a common format. The process begins with uniquely identifying each storm reported by different agencies and then combining intensity estimates to create a unified dataset.
Example.AnswerCn: 来自各个机构的最佳轨迹数据通过直接访问机构网站或个人沟通获得。收到数据文件后，将其转换为统一格式。该过程首先通过不同机构报告的每个风暴进行唯一标识，然后结合强度估计以创建统一的数据集。

Example.AnswerCn: 一个全球热带气旋数据集的例子包括27个风暴属性，分为七个不同的盆地：北大西洋（NA）、东太平洋（EP）、西北太平洋（WP）、北印度洋（NI）、南印度洋（SI）、南太平洋（SP）和南大西洋（SA）。

Example.AnswerCn: 全球热带气旋数据集可以以多种格式分发，包括netCDF、自动热带气旋预报（ATCF）、HURDAT、气旋扩展标记语言（cXML）、世界气象组织修订标准格式和逗号分隔值（CSV）。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'best-track data' in the context of tropical cyclone research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在热带气旋研究中，“最佳轨迹数据”是指对热带气旋路径和强度的最佳估计数据。这些数据通常基于观测、卫星图像和数值天气预报模型的综合分析，旨在提供最准确的热带气旋发展和移动信息。
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of tropical cyclone research, 'best-track data' refers to the best estimates of a storm's position and intensity at 6-hourly intervals. These estimates are typically derived from a postseason reanalysis of the storm using available data such as ship, surface, and satellite observations.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在热带气旋研究中，“最佳轨迹数据”指的是对风暴在每6小时间隔内位置和强度的最佳估计。这些估计通常是通过对风暴进行赛季后重新分析，利用可用的数据，如船只、地面和卫星观测得出的。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the method of combining intensity estimates from different agencies in a global dataset compare to the approach of using a single agency's data for tropical cyclone analysis?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 将来自不同机构的强度估计结合在一起的方法与使用单一机构的数据进行热带气旋分析的方法相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The method of combining intensity estimates from different agencies in a global dataset involves identifying each storm uniquely and merging data from multiple sources, which helps overcome the inhomogeneity of historical records. In contrast, using a single agency's data might limit the analysis to specific regional methodologies and may not address potential biases or gaps present in individual datasets.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 将来自不同机构的强度估计合并到全球数据集中涉及唯一识别每个风暴并合并来自多个来源的数据，这有助于克服历史记录的不均匀性。相比之下，使用单一机构的数据可能会将分析限制在特定区域的方法论，并可能无法解决个别数据集中存在的潜在偏差或缺口。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences between the formats used for providing tropical cyclone data, such as netCDF and CSV, in terms of accessibility and analysis?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 热带气旋数据的格式（如netCDF和CSV）在可访问性和分析方面的相似性和差异性是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both netCDF and CSV formats are used to provide tropical cyclone data, but they differ in their structure and usability. netCDF is a binary format that supports complex data structures and is often used for large datasets requiring efficient storage and retrieval. CSV is a simpler, text-based format that is easily accessible and widely compatible with various software tools, but may not handle complex data structures as efficiently as netCDF.
Comparison.AnswerCn: netCDF和CSV格式都用于提供热带气旋数据，但它们在结构和可用性上有所不同。netCDF是一种二进制格式，支持复杂的数据结构，通常用于需要高效存储和检索的大型数据集。CSV是一种更简单的文本格式，易于访问，并与各种软件工具广泛兼容，但可能无法像netCDF那样高效地处理复杂的数据结构。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can different observational technologies and data sources be effectively integrated to improve the accuracy and completeness of tropical cyclone best-track data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 如何有效整合不同的观测技术和数据源，以提高热带气旋最佳轨迹数据的准确性和完整性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration process involves obtaining best-track data from each agency, converting the data into a common format, uniquely identifying each storm across different sources, and then combining intensity estimates. Advances in observing system technologies, operational procedures, and scientific knowledge are crucial for this integration.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 集成过程涉及从各个机构获取最佳轨迹数据，将数据转换为统一格式，唯一识别不同来源的每个风暴，然后结合强度估计。观察系统技术、操作程序和科学知识的进步对这一集成至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using historical best-track data, which may be inhomogeneous, for assessing the interannual and interdecadal variability of tropical cyclones?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用历史最佳轨迹数据（可能存在不均匀性）来评估热带气旋的年际和年代际变率的影响是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Historical best-track data are inherently inhomogeneous due to evolving observational technologies and methodologies. Despite this, they have been used to assess the variability of tropical cyclones over different time scales, providing insights into their relationship with global climate change.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 历史最佳轨迹数据由于观测技术和方法的不断发展而固有地存在不均匀性。尽管如此，这些数据仍被用于评估热带气旋在不同时间尺度上的变异性，从而提供了它们与全球气候变化之间关系的见解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the standardization of data formats across different meteorological agencies facilitate global comparisons and analyses of tropical cyclone characteristics?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同气象机构之间数据格式的标准化可以通过以下方式促进热带气旋特征的全球比较和分析：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Standardizing data formats allows for easier comparison and analysis by collating data from various sources into a single, accessible global dataset. This standardization simplifies inter-agency comparisons and enables researchers to analyze tropical cyclone characteristics and impacts more effectively.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 标准化数据格式可以通过将来自各种来源的数据汇总到一个单一的、可访问的全球数据集中，从而使比较和分析变得更加容易。这种标准化简化了机构之间的比较，使研究人员能够更有效地分析热带气旋的特征和影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a need to convert best-track data into a common format for global tropical cyclones?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么需要将最佳轨迹数据转换为全球热带气旋的通用格式？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Converting best-track data into a common format is necessary to facilitate inter-agency comparisons and ensure that data from various sources can be easily analyzed. This conversion allows for the integration of storm information, ensuring consistency and usability for researchers studying tropical cyclones.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 将最佳轨迹数据转换为统一格式是必要的，以便促进各机构之间的比较，并确保来自不同来源的数据可以轻松分析。这种转换允许风暴信息的整合，确保研究热带气旋的研究人员能够保持一致性和可用性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the inhomogeneity in the historical record of best-track data for tropical cyclones?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致热带气旋最佳路径数据历史记录不均匀的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The inhomogeneity in the historical record of best-track data is caused by advancements in observing system technologies, operational procedures, and scientific knowledge over time. These developments lead to variations in data quality and availability, which impact the consistency of historical best-track records.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 历史最佳轨迹数据的不均匀性是由于观测系统技术、操作程序和科学知识的进步所导致的。这些发展导致数据质量和可用性的变化，从而影响历史最佳轨迹记录的一致性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of integrating best-track data from multiple international agencies on the reliability of tropical cyclone trajectory analyses?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合来自多个国际机构的最佳轨迹数据对热带气旋轨迹分析的可靠性可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating best-track data from multiple international agencies can lead to a more comprehensive and reliable dataset, as it combines information from various sources, simplifying inter-agency comparison and improving the overall quality of storm path analyses.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合来自多个国际机构的最佳轨迹数据可以形成更全面和可靠的数据集，因为它结合了来自不同来源的信息，简化了机构间的比较，并提高了风暴路径分析的整体质量。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might advancements in observing system technologies impact the consistency and historical accuracy of tropical cyclone best-track data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 观察系统技术的进步可能会如何影响热带气旋最佳路径数据的一致性和历史准确性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Advancements in observing system technologies may enhance the precision of current data collection but could also highlight inconsistencies in the historical records of best-track data due to differences in past and present methodologies.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 观察系统技术的进步可能会提高当前数据收集的精确度，但也可能会突出历史最佳轨迹数据记录中的不一致性，这主要是由于过去和现在的方法论差异所致。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose behind developing a comprehensive dataset that combines global tropical cyclone best-track data from multiple agencies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个综合数据集，结合来自多个机构的全球热带气旋最佳轨迹数据的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal was to inventory reported tropical cyclones worldwide and their characteristics and to provide the data as one global dataset: the International Best Track Archive for Climate Stewardship (IBTrACS).
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是对全球报告的热带气旋及其特征进行清查，并将数据作为一个全球数据集提供：国际气候管理最佳轨迹档案（IBTrACS）。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to convert best-track data from various agencies into a common format?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 将来自不同机构的最佳轨迹数据转换为统一格式的重要性在于：
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Upon receipt of the electronic best-track data files, data were converted into a common format to facilitate the process of combining best-track data by identifying each storm uniquely and to streamline comparisons and analyses.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 在收到电子最佳轨迹数据文件后，数据被转换为统一格式，以便通过唯一标识每个风暴来促进最佳轨迹数据的合并，并简化比较和分析的过程。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What motivated the collaboration between NOAA’s National Climatic Data Center and the World Data Center for Meteorology—Asheville in the collection of global tropical cyclone best-track data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 促使美国国家海洋和大气管理局国家气候数据中心与世界气象数据中心—阿什维尔合作收集全球热带气旋最佳路径数据的动机是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The collaboration aims to develop a comprehensive dataset through the collection of global tropical cyclone best-track data, which is crucial for understanding the characteristics and impacts of tropical cyclones in conjunction with other datasets.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该合作旨在通过收集全球热带气旋最佳轨迹数据来开发一个综合数据集，这对于理解热带气旋的特征和影响以及与其他数据集的结合至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What is the process of integrating multiple sources of storm data to create a comprehensive global tropical cyclone dataset?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 整合多个风暴数据源以创建全面的全球热带气旋数据集的过程是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The process involves obtaining best-track data from various agencies either through their websites or personal communication. The electronic data files are then converted into a common format. Identifying each storm uniquely across different agencies is the first step, followed by combining intensity estimates to ensure consistency and comprehensiveness.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该过程涉及从各个机构获取最佳轨迹数据，方法是通过他们的网站或个人沟通。然后将电子数据文件转换为统一格式。首先要在不同机构之间唯一识别每个风暴，接着结合强度估计，以确保一致性和全面性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can data from different meteorological agencies be standardized for inclusion in a global dataset?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何将来自不同气象机构的数据标准化，以便纳入全球数据集？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data from different meteorological agencies can be standardized by converting them into a common format, which allows for the combination of data from different sources. This includes identifying each storm uniquely and combining intensity estimates to maintain data integrity and enable comprehensive analysis.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 来自不同气象机构的数据可以通过转换为统一格式进行标准化，这允许将来自不同来源的数据进行合并。这包括唯一标识每个风暴，并结合强度估计以保持数据完整性，从而实现全面分析。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in ensuring the quality and accuracy of storm position and intensity in historical datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保历史数据集中风暴位置和强度的质量和准确性涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures involve postseason reanalysis of a storm’s position and intensity using all available data sources, such as ship, surface, and satellite observations. This reanalysis helps to address the inhomogeneity in the historical records, ensuring the quality and accuracy of the best-track data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些程序涉及对风暴位置和强度的季后重新分析，使用所有可用的数据源，如船只、地面和卫星观测。这种重新分析有助于解决历史记录中的不均匀性，确保最佳轨迹数据的质量和准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods or technologies enable the collation of global tropical cyclone best-track data from various international agencies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法或技术能够汇集来自各个国际机构的全球热带气旋最佳轨迹数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Best-track data from each of the agencies were obtained either directly from agency Web sites or via personal communication. Upon receipt of the electronic best-track data files, data were converted into a common format, which is a crucial step in combining best-track data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 来自各个机构的最佳轨迹数据要么直接从机构网站获取，要么通过个人沟通获得。在收到电子最佳轨迹数据文件后，数据被转换为统一格式，这是合并最佳轨迹数据的关键步骤。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of multiple data sources enable a comprehensive understanding of tropical cyclone characteristics and their global impact?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 多个数据源的整合如何使我们全面理解热带气旋的特征及其全球影响？
Enablement.AnswerEn: By combining storm information from multiple centers into one product, IBTrACS provides a global dataset that allows for the assessment of interannual and interdecadal variability of tropical cyclones and their relation to global climate change.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过将多个中心的风暴信息结合成一个产品，IBTrACS提供了一个全球数据集，使得能够评估热带气旋的年际和年代际变率及其与全球气候变化的关系。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the necessary conditions for effectively consolidating and archiving tropical cyclone data to provide a reliable resource for scientific research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 有效整合和归档热带气旋数据以提供可靠的科学研究资源所需的必要条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The effective consolidation and archiving of tropical cyclone data require collaboration with all regional specialized meteorological centers and other international centers and individuals, as well as the creation of a global best-track dataset that merges storm information from multiple sources.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 热带气旋数据的有效整合和归档需要与所有区域专业气象中心以及其他国际中心和个人的合作，并创建一个全球最佳轨迹数据集，将来自多个来源的风暴信息合并。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected outcomes of using best-track data from multiple sources for understanding tropical cyclone characteristics?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用来自多个来源的最佳轨迹数据来理解热带气旋特征的预期结果是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: By collating best-track data from multiple sources, the expected outcome is a comprehensive understanding of tropical cyclone characteristics and impacts, aiding assessments of interannual and interdecadal variability and their relation to global climate change.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 通过整合来自多个来源的最佳轨迹数据，预期结果是对热带气旋特征和影响的全面理解，从而有助于评估年际和十年际变率及其与全球气候变化的关系。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of current data collection methods for tropical cyclones in terms of ensuring the uniformity and completeness of global records?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估当前热带气旋数据收集方法的有效性，以确保全球记录的一致性和完整性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The effectiveness of current data collection methods for tropical cyclones can be seen in their ability to provide a comprehensive global dataset by collating best-track data from multiple agencies worldwide. However, the historical record remains inhomogeneous due to advances in observing technologies and methodologies over time. Despite these challenges, the efforts to standardize data formats and identify unique storms across different sources improve the uniformity and completeness of global records.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前热带气旋数据收集方法的有效性体现在它们能够通过整合全球多个机构的最佳轨迹数据来提供全面的全球数据集。然而，由于观测技术和方法的进步，历史记录仍然不均匀。尽管面临这些挑战，努力标准化数据格式和识别不同来源的独特风暴有助于提高全球记录的统一性和完整性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't understand how data from different meteorological agencies can be effectively harmonized into a single, coherent dataset.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解来自不同气象机构的数据如何有效地协调成一个统一、一致的数据集。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Best-track data from each agency are obtained and converted into a common format. The process involves uniquely identifying each storm reported by different agencies and combining their intensity estimates.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 来自各个机构的最佳轨迹数据被获取并转换为统一格式。该过程涉及唯一识别不同机构报告的每个风暴，并结合它们的强度估计。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how comprehensive a dataset can be in terms of attributes and formats to support tropical cyclone research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白一个数据集在属性和格式方面可以有多全面，以支持热带气旋研究。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The dataset includes 27 storm attributes across seven different basins and is available in several formats such as netCDF, ATCF, HURDAT, cXML, WMO revised standard format, and CSV, providing flexibility for analysis.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该数据集包括跨越七个不同流域的27个风暴属性，并以多种格式提供，如netCDF、ATCF、HURDAT、cXML、WMO修订标准格式和CSV，提供了灵活的分析选择。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the various methods used to collect and integrate best-track data from multiple international meteorological agencies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查用于收集和整合来自多个国际气象机构的最佳轨迹数据的各种方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Best-track data from different agencies are obtained either directly from agency websites or via personal communication. These data files are then converted into a common format. The process involves uniquely identifying each storm reported by different agencies and then combining the intensity estimates to create a unified dataset.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 来自不同机构的最佳轨迹数据是直接从机构网站获取或通过个人沟通获得的。这些数据文件随后被转换为统一格式。该过程涉及唯一识别不同机构报告的每个风暴，并结合强度估计以创建统一的数据集。
